p:
All vaccines and adjuvants used in the study are of high translational potential. The LAIV component used in this study grows to high titers in eggs, which allows for large-scale manufacturing. The backbone of the LAIV is based on the Leningrad vaccine strain, which has been licensed and successfully used in humans.
37 The split virus vaccines were produced in a cell-culture-based approach that has previously been used to manufacture pandemic H5N1 split virus vaccines by GlaxoSmithKline.
38 Furthermore, the adjuvant AS03 has been licensed for use in humans for pandemic influenza virus vaccines.
39
